players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he investigated Bob, revealing that Bob is the mafioso. We should focus on eliminating Bob first."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I will continue to protect my fellow mafia members. We need to eliminate Charlie first to ensure our survival."
Diana: "I am not the mafioso, and I believe Charlie is lying. We should focus on eliminating Bob as he was found near Alice's body."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
